items.sentence: I don\'t want to hear another peep out of you.
I don\'t want to hear another word out of you.
I don\'t want to think about anything anymore.
I don\'t want you eating donuts every morning.
I don\'t want you to treat me any differently.
He told them that he had had a wonderful time.
He was sitting there with a pipe in his mouth.
Tom knows that Mary doesn\'t love him anymore.
Tom might like it, but I don\'t think he will.
I plan to go to Boston next Monday to see Tom.
I played the violin when I was in high school.
They shook hands when they met at the airport.
This is one of the reasons that I like Boston.
Tom has been told he doesn\'t have to do that.
Yoga can improve one\'s health and well-being.
You aren\'t really going to kill Tom, are you?
Tom wants to know when we\'re going to Boston.
Have you ever seen a snake swallowing a mouse?

When was the last time you ate lunch with Tom?
